text: WHILOM, as tells the tale, was a walled cheaping-town hight Utterhay,
title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles
author: Morris, William

text: which was builded in a bight of the land a little off the great highway
title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles
author: Morris, William

text: which went from over the mountains to the sea.
title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles
author: Morris, William

title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles
author: Morris, William

text: The said town was hard on the borders of a wood, which men held to be
title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles
author: Morris, William

text: mighty great, or maybe measureless; though few indeed had entered it, and
title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles
author: Morris, William

text: they that had, brought back tales wild and confused thereof.
title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles
author: Morris, William

title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles

title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles
author: Morris, William

title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles
author: Morris, William

title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles
author: Morris, William

author: Morris, William

text: For all men deemed it more than perilous; and some said that there walked
title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles
author: Morris, William

text: the worst of the dead; othersome that the Goddesses of the Gentiles
title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles
author: Morris, William

text: haunted there; others again that it was the faery rather, but they full
title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles
author: Morris, William

text: of malice and guile.  But most commonly it was deemed that the devils
title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles
author: Morris, William

text: swarmed amidst of its thickets, and that wheresoever a man sought to, who
title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles
author: Morris, William

text: was once environed by it, ever it was the Gate of Hell whereto he came.
title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles
author: Morris, William

title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles

title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles

title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles

title: The Water of the Wondrous Isles
